title: BHP’s Bumper Copper Profits Offset China Drag on Iron Ore
description: BHP Group said first-half earnings jumped by more than a fifth, as a years-long push to boost copper production and a surge in prices for the red metal helped to offset weakness in its China-focused iron ore and steelmaking coal businesses.
content: BHP Group said first-half earnings jumped by more than a fifth, as a years-long push to boost copper production and a surge in prices for the red metal helped to offset weakness in its China-focused iron ore and steelmaking coal businesses.
